EmailTemplate.description: Change in commissions payment due to Christmas
EmailTemplate.name: Commissions Information for Christmas holiday
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Palmetto Commissions Information for Christmas Holiday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
This year, Christmas Eve falls on Monday, December 24th & Christmas Day falls on Tuesday, December 25th. To accommodate the Holiday schedule Palmetto's Commissions payments & report timing will adjust as follows over the next 2 weeks:
1) Tues Dec 18th - Commissions Report; Weds Dec 19th - Commissions Payment 2) Weds Dec 26th - Commissions Report & Commissions Payment 3) Weds Jan 2nd - Commissions Report & Commissions Payment
Commissions processing will return to its normal schedule with the Friday, Jan 4th Commissions Run.
Commissions will continue to process for all projects hitting a milestone up to 1 business day before the processing day.
Feel free to reach out to your Account Manager with any questions.
Wishing you a very happy holiday season.
- Team Palmetto
